title: Genie Energy reports 2Q loss
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Aug 6, 2015, 13:13 BST - UK Markets close in 3 hrs 17 mins Genie Energy reports 2Q loss Genie Energy posts 2nd-quarter loss of $4.5 million Associated Press – 15 minutes ago 9.68 -0.31 
NEWARK, N.J. (AP) _ Genie Energy Ltd. (GNE) on Thursday reported a loss of $4.5 million in its second quarter. 
The Newark, New Jersey-based company said it had a loss of 22 cents per share. 
The provider of oil and gas energy services posted revenue of $39.5 million in the period. 
Genie Energy shares have climbed 57 percent since the beginning of the year. The stock has increased 40 percent in the last 12 months. 

This story was generated by Automated Insights (http://automatedinsights.com/ap) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on GNE at http://www.zacks.com/ap/GNE
